intro: Aneilema pinetorum, commonly known as the Pine Forest Aneilema, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. Its leaves are typically lance-shaped and have a glossy surface. Aneilema pinetorum is often found in shaded, moist environments such as forests and along stream banks.
